QuestData.Title: Totemic Call
QuestData.Description: I heard the others talking earlier. I may know the cause of their fear.$B$BThey say the Chieftain has a mysterious totem. It gives him power, and fearful visions.$B$BIf you destroy the totem, the madness will end.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $n! My nephew is returned to me.$B$BHe explains that the source of the madness comes from a powerful totem, deep in our village. $B$BIt makes sense, but who - or WHAT - gave us such a thing?$B$BI will share this knowledge with the druids at once.
